About Me

I currently work as a breaking news reporter in Riverside. My duties vary day-to-day, but for the most part I catch break public safety news and write other stories for PE.com. Iâ€™m first and foremost a reporter, but I do a lot of digital production as needed, which can mean brainstorming a headline, coming up with Facebook teasers or finding art for a wire story.

I grew up in a small Minnesota suburb called South St. Paul. After graduation, I went on to the University of North Dakota. For North Dakota-related reasons, and because Minneapolis has a better media market, I left for the University of Minnesota.

I took an internship back in Fargo and then moved out to California because I wanted a change in scenery.
